name: Creature Keeper
summary: Creature Keeper is a top-down action-adventure RPG where you can befriend wild creatures and raise them to fight alongside you! Scout the creatures of the world and build up your dream team! Cook foods to strengthen your creatures and craft trinkets from the materials grown in your pocket garden. Learn skills from your strongest to help you take on bigger creatures.
info:
• 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: ARPG
  • 游玩人数: 1人
  • 发行日期: 2021年
  • 开发: Fervir
